Series.Actors: |Emmy Rossum|William H. Macy|Ethan Cutkosky|Emma Kenney|Cameron Monaghan|Jeremy Allen White|Justin Chatwin|Noel Fisher|Steve Howey|Shanola Hampton|Emily Bergl|Stephanie Fantauzzi|Emma Greenwell|Laura Wiggins|Joan Cusack|Zach McGowan|
Series.Overview: Chicagoan Frank Gallagher is the proud single dad of six smart, industrious, independent kids, who without him would be... perhaps better off. When Frank's not at the bar spending what little money they have, he's passed out on the floor. But the kids have found ways to grow up in spite of him. They may not be like any family you know, but they make no apologies for being exactly who they are.

Episode.Overview: The Shameless Cast celebrates Christmas with a song as only the Gallaghers could.

Episode.GuestStars: Joan Cusack
Episode.Overview: Drunken father Frank is of no use to his dysfunctional family; Fiona meets a handsome stranger when her purse is stolen; Lip is shocked to discover his brother Ian is gay and tries to hook him up with a willing neighbor.

Episode.GuestStars: Tyler Jacob Moore|Joel Murray|Missy Doty
Episode.Overview: Frank has a drunken run-in with Karen's father and takes it out on Ian. The family starts a manhunt when Frank is nowhere to be found on disability check day.

Episode.GuestStars: Jillian Armenante|Noel Fisher|Jane Levy|Gloria LeRoy|Tyler Jacob Moore|Pej Vahdat|
Episode.Overview: Fiona turns her attentions to Tony, a cop who has had a crush on her since childhood, but Steve isn't willing to give up without a fight; Ian is targeted by the brothers of a girl he spurned; the whole family searches for elderly Aunt Ginger, who owns their house.

Episode.GuestStars: Tim Bagley|Vanessa Bell Calloway|Tyler Jacob Moore|Joel Murray|Tyler F. Anderson|Missy Doty|
Episode.Overview: Debbie, sad and lonely after Aunt Ginger leaves, steals a little boy from a birthday party. In classic Gallagher style, the family hatches a plan to return the toddler safe and sound without attracting attention from the Chicago Police Department, who has made the kidnapping a top priority. Karen, in complete defiance of Eddie, starts to tease Frank sexually. Frank not knowing what to make of it keeps himself busy with booze, picking up Sheila'Â­s meds from the pharmacy and concentrating on finding the missing boy. What began as an innocent lie for Kevin to protect himself from a hot girl ultimately becomes a proposal of marriage for Veronica.

Episode.GuestStars: Anthony Anderson|Vanessa Bell Calloway|Jane Levy|Sandy Martin|Tyler Jacob Moore|Marguerite Moreau|Joel Murray|Pej Vahdat|
Episode.Overview: When the Gallagher's find out Veronica comes from a wealthy family, they try to scheme a fake wedding for the dowry. Meanwhile, Frank gets some bad news about his health.

Episode.GuestStars: Dennis Boutsikaris|Noel Fisher|Brent Jennings|Robert Knepper|Marguerite Moreau|Joel Murray|Pej Vahdat|
Episode.Overview: Fiona tries to prove the Gallagher home is suitable for rehabilitating a delinquent after receiving a letter from Carl's teacher; Lip gets busted taking the SAT for fellow students in exchange for cash; Kash and Ian are ashamed at their failure to stop a string of robberies at the Kash and Grab; Frank's poor business acumen continues to have negative consequences.

Episode.EpisodeName: Frank Gallagher: Loving Husband, Devoted Father
Episode.GuestStars: Noel Fisher|Robert Knepper|Jane Levy|Marguerite Moreau|Pej Vahdat|Timothy V. Murphy|Missy Doty|
Episode.Overview: Frank gets into trouble with two goons he owes money. Fiona asks Sheila to take care of Liam while she spends a night with Steve, and Ian tries to stop Mickey from bullying Kash.

Episode.EpisodeName: It's Time to Kill the Turtle
Episode.GuestStars: Dennis Boutsikaris|Madison Davenport|Noel Fisher|Christopher Gartin|Jane Levy|Pej Vahdat
Episode.Overview: Sheila fears to lose Frank when he gives up drinking. While Lip suspects their dad hasn't changed, Debbie and Carl enjoy having Frank back in their life. Meanwhile, Fiona tries to find a better paying job.

Episode.EpisodeName: But at Last Came a Knock
Episode.GuestStars: Alex Borstein|Madison Davenport|Julia Duffy|Noel Fisher|Joel Murray|Pej Vahdat|Chloe Webb|
Episode.Overview: Monica comes back when Frank needs her to sign documents and decides to take Liam with her. Meanwhile, Steve and Fiona move together.

Episode.GuestStars: Noel Fisher|Mo Gaffney|Jane Levy|Tyler Jacob Moore|Joel Murray|Chloe Webb|
Episode.Overview: The children's paternity is put into question and Frank needs Carl's help.

Episode.GuestStars: Amy Smart|Louise Fletcher|Lindsey Ginter|Brad William Henke|Russell Hornsby|Leonard Earl Howze|John Kapelos|Tyler Jacob Moore|Joel Murray|
Episode.Overview: Tony comes closer to discovering what Steve is doing, while Fiona makes a new friend. In the meantime, Lip helps Ian look for his father.

Episode.GuestStars: Amy Smart|Madison Davenport|Julia Duffy|Russell Hornsby|Toby Huss|Tyler Jacob Moore|Joel Murray|Jeremy Ratchford|
Episode.Overview: Steve tries to convince Fiona to skip town with him now that his true livelihood as been discovered; Frank and Karen's secret is revealed, forcing Frank to go into hiding; Fiona tries to figure out how to get Lip and Ian out of jail after their arrest for car theft.

Episode.GuestStars: Amy Smart|James Wolk|Madison Davenport|Marcus Brown|Pej Vahdat|Emma Greenwell|Tyler Jacob Moore|Marguerite Moreau|Jack Carter|Dennis Boutsikaris|
Episode.Overview: Fiona spends her summer with a new guy and bartending, while Debbie runs a daycare at their home. Meanwhile, Kevin realizes his extended weed-growing left him with a huge electrical bill and Frank borrows his youngest son Liam to help him pay a debt.

Episode.GuestStars: Dale Wade Davis|Amy Smart|Noel Fisher|Emma Greenwell|Madison Davenport|Marguerite Moreau|
Episode.Overview: As Sheila conquers her agoraphobia, a worried Frank finds a new financial plan in fellow bar patron Dottie, whose declining health and city pension make her an ideal match; Fiona juggles her job, the kids and her burgeoning love life, and Jasmine tries to help by setting up Fiona with a sugar daddy; Veronica takes some old folks from the home on an excursion; Lip worries about Karen's growing relationship with Jody; Ian tries to land a recently released Mickey a job at the Kash and Grab; Debbie wants her own room; Carl moves into the van.

Episode.EpisodeName: I'll Light a Candle for You Every Day
Episode.GuestStars: Molly Price|Madison Davenport|Zach McGowan|Trey Teufel|
Episode.Overview: Fiona hopes her moral compass isn't leading her astray when she reconnects with her married high school crush, but when she finds an abandoned purse with over five hundred dollars inside, she assumes her luck is finally changing; Frank is willing to do just about anything to stay in Dottie's good graces, even marry her; after Harry's passing, Debbie becomes obsessed with death; Kevin thinks about buying the Alibi; Lip meets with a colonel to glean information for Ian about West Point; Jody asks Frank for Karen's hand in marriage.

Episode.GuestStars: Amy Smart|James Wolk|Madison Davenport|Noel Fisher|Zach McGowan|Emma Greenwell|Taylor Kinney|Brit Morgan|Nicky Korba|Zayne Emory|Dove Cameron|
Episode.Overview: Fiona deals with the consequences of sleeping with Craig when his angry wife shows up at the door; Debbie develops a stress-rash and Fiona wonders if she's putting too much responsibility on the kids; Sheila has made it all the way to the hair salon and Frank realizes his days in the Jackson household are numbered; no longer having sex with Karen, Lip tries to dig up dirt on Jody; Ian continues on the path to West Point; Carl house-sits with his friend, Little Hank; Ethel meets Malik, a boy on Kevin's youth basketball team.

Episode.GuestStars: Madison Davenport|Zach McGowan|Emma Greenwell|Peter Murnik|Johnny Sneed|
Episode.Overview: Frank tries to claim Eddie's insurance benefits and pension, despite being a prime suspect in his death; Fiona attends a ritzy wedding with Richard and lies about her background; Lip is devastated by Karen's rejection; Carl rents Frank's room to a hooker.

Episode.GuestStars: James Wolk|Madison Davenport|Zach McGowan|Tyler Jacob Moore|Stephanie Fantauzzi|Rob Benedict|Lisa K. Wyatt|Louise Fletcher|
Episode.Overview: Grammy Gallagher shows up on a medical furlough and tries to track down a former meth lab protege that owes her money; Sheila plans Karen's wedding reception; Fiona double dates with Steve and his Brazilian girlfriend, and discovers that Steve is married; Ethel reacts to Clyde's death; Frank discovers the identity of Eddie's insurance beneficiary.
Episode.Writer: William H. Macy|Steven Schachter|Steven Schaffer|LaToya Morgan|

Episode.GuestStars: Amy Smart|Zach McGowan|Stephanie Fantauzzi|Gwen McGee|Rakefet Abergel|Gloria Garayua|Jack Carter|Louise Fletcher|
Episode.Overview: Lip tries to get back in Karen's good graces by crafting a prenuptial agreement for her and Jody, while Ian continues to give Lip the silent treatment; Frank wants to kick Grammy out but Fiona resists until the basement meth lab explodes; Fiona is invited on a boat trip but doesn't realize Steve and his girlfriend are also attending.

Episode.GuestStars: Zach McGowan|Stephanie Fantauzzi|Noel Fisher|Chloe Webb|Ed Lauter|Susan Krebs|Larry Clarke|Diora Baird|
Episode.Overview: With Grammy near death, Frank exits the house but walks in on Ian and Mickey locked in passion at the Kash and Grab; when Lip drops out of school, Fiona proposes a deal where they both earn their diplomas, but Lip acts out and gets himself expelled when he realizes that Karen plans to sell their baby to the highest bidder.

Episode.GuestStars: Chloe Webb|Emma Greenwell
Episode.Overview: Monica returns to party and plot scams with Frank, but the rest of the family suspects she hasn't returned to stay; Fiona reconsiders her decision to kick Lip out of the house; Grammy's death affects everyone differently, and leaves Frank determined to make sure he gets every last penny his mother left behind; Sheila and Jody think Eddie's ghost is haunting the house.

Episode.GuestStars: Chloe Webb|Zach McGowan|Stephanie Fantauzzi|Emma Greenwell|Diora Baird
Episode.Overview: Fiona starts to plan for her future now that Monica is back but her reprieve may be short-lived as Monica falls apart, spends the squirrel fund and gets arrested; Steve conspires to reunite Estefania with her true love so that he can be with Fiona; Lip and Ian learn the true identity of Mandy's baby; Sheila takes in a homeless crack addict.

It's a typical Gallagher nontraditional Thanksgiving that includes a suicide attempt by Monica, Carl shooting a bald eagle, and Karen going into labor; Steve agrees to allow Estefania's boyfriend to steal his identity; Ian sleeps with a businessman named Ned; Frank tries to get his share of his mother's money from his brother Clayton.

Episode.GuestStars: Harry Hamlin|Chloe Webb|Zach McGowan|Stephanie Fantauzzi|Emma Greenwell|Tyler Jacob Moore|Julia Duffy|Christopher Gartin|Jim Hoffmaster|William Charles Mitchell|Larry Herron|Jenna Elfman
Episode.Overview: A lonely Frank schemes to break Monica out of the psychiatric facility. Jimmy earns his way back into Fiona's good graces and she asks to meet his family while Ian runs into Ned again.

Episode.GuestStars: Harry Hamlin|Stephanie Fantauzzi|Ed Lauter|Bernardo de Paula|PÃªpÃª Rapazote|Lombardo Boyar|Diora Baird|Thierre Di Castro|Danny Mora|Tara Karsian|John Bishop
Episode.Overview: Fiona struggles to accept the new Jimmy; Frank wakes up in a place completely foreign to him.

Episode.GuestStars: Stephanie Fantauzzi|Ed Lauter|Bernardo de Paula|Cameron Richardson|Vyto Ruginis|Diora Baird|Brendan Patrick Connor|Joseph Fuhr|Michael Patrick McGill|Kerry O'Malley|Kevin Phillips|Harrison Xu|Chasty Ballesteros|C.J. Berdahl||Rebecca Jordan|Burton Perez
Episode.Overview: Fiona is stressed about the money she used for her club night; Frank makes his way home.

Episode.GuestStars: Harry Hamlin|Stephanie Fantauzzi|Eric Edelstein|Bernardo de Paula|Cameron Richardson|Justine Lupe|C.J. Berdahl|Dennis Cockrum|Lauri Johnson|Melissa De Sousa|J. Michael Trautmann|Zoran Korach|Michael Patrick McGill
Episode.Overview: Frank tells Carl he has cancer to scam a charity foundation; Lip hunts down pedophiles in the neighborhood.

Episode.GuestStars: Harry Hamlin|Eric Edelstein|Madison Moellers|Galadriel Stineman|Charles Henry Wyson|Julie Ariola|J.J. Boone|Sally Ann Brooks|Ellen Gerstein|Roberta Valderrama|Cooper Gillespie|Michael Patrick McGill
Episode.Overview: Carl says his goodbyes; Frank is on babysitting duty; Sheila wants to introduce Jody to toy time.

Episode.GuestStars: Harry Hamlin|Vanessa Bell Calloway|Julia Duffy|Eric Edelstein|Stephanie Fantauzzi|Madison Moellers|Rose Abdoo|Keiko Agena|Nicky Korba|J. Michael Trautmann|Roberta Valderrama|David Wells|Madison Curtis|Michael Patrick McGill
Episode.Overview: The city needs to work on the sewer main and Frank must find Aunt Ginger's bones in the yard before they dig.

Episode.GuestStars: Alex Borstein|Vanessa Bell Calloway|Eric Edelstein|Juanita Jennings|Mustafa Shakir|Chris Butler|Mike Doyle|Keiko Agena|Julie Ariola|Chris Burns|Dennis Cockrum|Alex Alexander|David Boller|Darrell Britt-Gibson|Isidora Goreshter|RenÃ© Mena|Sarah Stouffer
Episode.Overview: Fiona is desperate to get the children back after the Department of Family Services hauls them away.

Episode.GuestStars: Ryan Bittle|Mike Doyle|Stephanie Fantauzzi|Barry Shabaka Henley|Juanita Jennings|Mary Mara|Bernardo de Paula|Elizabeth Sung|Keiko Agena|Daija Owens|David Wells|Laura Wiggins
Episode.Overview: Frank and Fiona go to extreme lengths in court to claim custody of the kids.

Episode.GuestStars: Noel Fisher|Christian Clemenson|Bernardo de Paula|Tyler Jacob Moore|Brent Sexton|
Episode.Overview: The family gathers for the real Aunt Ginger's fake funeral.

Episode.GuestStars: Bradley Whitford|Christian Clemenson|Matthew Glave|Mary Mara|Bernardo de Paula|Sunkrish Bala|Bill Brochtrup|Maile Flanagan|Pamala Tyson|Jake McDorman|Laura Wiggins
Episode.Overview: Fiona starts a new office job but has a hard time fitting in with the corporate culture. In an attempt to get medical coverage, Frank inadvertently becomes involved in the gay rights movement where he meets Abraham Paige, a powerful activist.

Episode.GuestStars: Bradley Whitford|Jake McDorman|Vanessa Bell Calloway|Dan Donohue|Lisa Long|Bernardo de Paula|E.J. Bonilla|Bill Brochtrup|Jake Dogias|Maile Flanagan|Laura Wiggins|Jeff Doucette|
Episode.Overview: Fiona's job has brought structure ito her life, but when Jimmy drops a bomb on her things fall apart. Frank is happy with his newfound celebrity as the face of the gay rights movement.

Episode.GuestStars: Jake McDorman|Stephanie Fantauzzi|Bernardo de Paula|PÃªpÃª Rapazote|Sunkrish Bala|Dennis Cockrum|Isidora Goreshter|Laura Wiggins
Episode.Overview: Fiona takes the kids on a camping trip. Essentially homeless, Frank seeks out Carl who sneaks him into the Gallagher van for the night.

Episode.GuestStars: Harry Hamlin|Vanessa Bell Calloway|Ed Lauter|Bernardo de Paula|Bill Brochtrup|Yorgo Constantine|Maile Flanagan|Juan Pope|Marcello Thedford|Jake McDorman|Laura Wiggins
Episode.Overview: Fiona and the family prepare a surprise high school,graduation party for Lip. Frank wins a bet and uses the winnings to take Lip out for lobster and some quality father/son time.

Episode.GuestStars: Vanessa Bell Calloway|Jack Carter|Tyler Jacob Moore|Dennis Cockrum|Isidora Goreshter|Joe Adler|Bill Brochtrup|Maile Flanagan|James Allen McCune|Rose Abdoo|Adam Cagley|Kate Cobb|Paul James|Lynn Ann Leveridge|Michael Patrick McGill|Danika Yarosh
Episode.Overview: Frank returns, disrupting life; Lip attends college; Ian is missing; Fiona tries to connect with Debbie and Carl.

Episode.GuestStars: Vanessa Bell Calloway|Johanna Braddy|James Allen McCune|Adam Cagley|Shane Edelman|Kimberly Hebert Gregory|Alison Haislip|Tate Hanyok|Roger Hewlett|Cherami Leigh|Michael Patrick McGill|Kerry O'Malley|Teresa Ornelas|Jonathan Schmock|Corey Sorenson
Episode.Overview: Fiona enjoys living above the poverty line; the company car is damaged; Lip struggles in school.

Episode.GuestStars: Emily Bergl|Nick Gehlfuss|James Allen McCune|Adam Cagley|Eloy Casados|Gideon Emery|Steven M. Gagnon|Michael Patrick McGill|Teresa Ornelas|Ray Porter|Danika Yarosh
Episode.Overview: Frank stalks his daughter, Sammi; Fiona and Mike get serious; Carl tries to hear money for Frank; Sheila has a successful date.

Episode.GuestStars: Emily Bergl|Alex Borstein|Nick Gehlfuss|Dennis Cockrum|Isidora Goreshter|James Allen McCune|Adam Cagley|Michael Patrick McGill|Kerry O'Malley|Kai Caster|Rosalind Chao|Svetlana Efremova|Gideon Emery|Michael Mantell|Danika Yarosh
Episode.Overview: Fiona continues her affair with Robbie; Frank wants to construct an accident that will enable him to pay for his transplant.

Episode.GuestStars: Emily Bergl|Harry Hamlin|Alex Borstein|Nick Gehlfuss|Maile Flanagan|Isidora Goreshter|Raff Anoushian|Sheldon Bailey|Eloy Casados|Steven M. Gagnon|Lyn Alicia Henderson|Lynn Ann Leveridge|Virginia Morris|Drew Rausch|Montae Russell|Jonathan Schmock
Episode.Overview: Fiona's bad decisions about Robbie come to a head; Frank and Sammi continue their quest for a cure; Lip is visited while at college.

Episode.GuestStars: Emily Bergl|Scott Grimes|Lisa Vidal|Audrey Wasilewski|Dennis Cockrum|James Allen McCune|Hedy Burress|Adam Cagley|Eloy Casados|Saidah Arrika Ekulona|Jan Hoag|Bill Kalmenson
Episode.Overview: Fiona ends up in jail; the family waits for news about Liam; Frank wakes up in the emergency room.

Episode.EpisodeName: A Jailbird, Invalid, Martyr, Cutter, Retard, and Parasitic Twin
Episode.GuestStars: Emily Bergl|Wendy Phillips|Lisa Vidal|Isidora Goreshter|James Allen McCune|Nichole Bloom|Edward Edwards|Denise Grayson|Will Green|Gregory Linington|Jayden Lund|Karen Maruyama|Michael Patrick McGill|Teresa Ornelas|Danika Yarosh
Episode.Overview: Fiona is released; Lip takes over guardianship duties, receiving unexpected assistance.

Episode.GuestStars: Emily Bergl|Regina King|Vanessa Bell Calloway|Nick Gehlfuss|Isidora Goreshter|James Allen McCune|Nichole Bloom|Adam Cagley|Jim Hoffmaster|Ralph P. Martin|Megan Murphy|Michael Patrick McGill|Ray Porter|Lidia Porto
Episode.Overview: To prepare for a visit from her probation officer, Fiona must remove all paraphernalia from the house; Ian is kicked out of Mickey's house.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Legend of Bonnie and Carl
Episode.GuestStars: Emily Bergl|Regina King|Nick Gehlfuss|Morgan Lily|Maile Flanagan|Isidora Goreshter|James Allen McCune|Sheldon Bailey|Nichole Bloom|Elizabeth Bond|Adam Cagley|Kate Cobb|Michael Patrick McGill
Episode.Overview: Carl connects with a girl in detention; Lip and Amanda grow closer; Sheila returns with big plans; Fiona searches for a job; Mickey spends time with Ian.

Episode.GuestStars: Emily Bergl|Regina King|Vanessa Bell Calloway|Nick Gehlfuss|Maz Jobrani|Morgan Lily|Isidora Goreshter|Ronnie Gene Blevins|Nichole Bloom|Adam Cagley|Robert Cicchini|Jim Hoffmaster|Tobias Jelinek|Karen Maruyama|Michael Patrick McGill
Episode.Overview: Fiona violates terms of her probation, sending the family into search party mode.

Episode.GuestStars: Joan Cusack|Emily Bergl|Austin Abrams|Morgan Lily|Dennis Cockrum|Isidora Goreshter|James Allen McCune|Nichole Bloom|Emy Coligado|Alyson Croft|Suzanne Cryer|Ian Kahn|Heather McComb|Aubrey K. Miller|Teresa Ornelas|Danika Yarosh|Time Winters |Kellen Michael
Episode.Overview: Fiona is taken to a correctional facility; Frank suffers post-operative delirium; Ian crashes Mickey's son's christening; Amanda's parents use bribery to keep Lip away from her; Debbie meets an older student.

Episode.GuestStars: Justin Chatwin|Emily Bergl|Regina King|Jeffrey Dean Morgan|Dichen Lachman|Morgan Lily|Isidora Goreshter|James Allen McCune|Alessandra Balazs|Nichole Bloom|Merrin Dungey|Jim Hoffmaster|Michael Patrick McGill|Delanna Studi|Time Winters
Episode.Overview: Sheila fights for custody and clashes with Sammi; Lip catches up on bills; Fiona is released; Frank begins to feel like himself.
Fiona juggles her job and a crush. Lip heads back home.
Sheila gets an offer to buy her home. Plus, Fiona is off house arrest!
Frank enlists Carl to scare off the lesbians. Debbie throws a wild party.

Episode.EpisodeName: A Night to Rememâ¦ Wait, What?
Episode.Overview: Frank retraces the path of an epic bender. Fiona and Gus head to city hall.
Fiona's plans to announce her marriage unravel. Mickey asks for Lip's help.
Fiona is thrown into chaos by the return of Jimmy. Ian takes Mickey's baby.

Episode.EpisodeName: Tell Me You Fucking Need Me
Episode.Overview: Ian begins to regain some of his senses - and finds himself under a mandatory hold at the psych ward. Meanwhile, Sammi is forced to take drastic measures to teach Frank a lesson. Plus, Fiona makes a decision regarding her potential romantic futures with Jimmy and/or Gus, Lip learns that his tuition is short twelve grand, Carl seizes an opportunity to make Chuckie his slave, and after V moves out, Svetlana moves in with Kev in exchange for the performance of some odd 'wifely duties.'

Fiona is confused by the status of her relationship when Gus announces he's leaving to go on tour. Meanwhile, Carl is asked by his boss to run drugs to Indiana; Frank sees a way to get revenge on Sammi by using Chuckie as the mule and having him busted; and Lip, still in need of tuition money, convinces Kev to come to the dorms and sell drugs. Plus, as Ian refuses to accept his bipolar diagnosis, Debbie is tasked with minding his new meds

Episode.GuestStars: |Sasha Alexander|Bojana Novakovic|Shani Atias|
Episode.Overview: Frank has a check-up with his uptight doctor, Bianca, who's cracking up after getting a terminal cancer diagnosis. Discovering she hasn't truly 'lived,' he agrees to be her tour guide to the seedier side of life. Meanwhile, Fiona preps an uncooperative Carl for his sentencing hearing. Plus, Lip sleeps with a professor on the assumption he's only days away from being kicked out, Ian realizes it's time to get back on his meds and Kev finds himself enjoying college life as campus 'rapewalker.'

Frank is having a ball with Bianca, his new sick friend and formerly uptight doctor. But when Bianca thinks Frank might be developing feelings for her she kicks him to the curb. Frank, however, returns to put up a fight.
Frank grows concerned as Bianca's behavior becomes increasingly more erratic and dangerous - but he'll do just about anything to show her a great time.

Episode.EpisodeName: Love Songs (In the Key of Gallagher)
Episode.Overview: Fiona reunites with Gus after he returns from his tour, but she struggles with the fact that her feelings for Sean have turned into love. In Costa Rica, Frank has love struggles of his own while he works to keep Bianca happy.
